attributes.action: Increase the pay rates for our heroes!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lower rankes solidiers in the army get paid less than traffic wardens. This is certainly not on. Those soldiers get paid around £13000 per annum and a traffic warden gets paid £17000 per annum. The soldiers are away from home 6 months per year and are risking there lives everyday for us. They deserve more hounor and respect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
